summary:
Berkshire Hathaway is a huge American company based in Nebraska. It was started in 1839 making textiles but changed to a big conglomerate in 1965 under Warren Buffett. Now, it owns many different businesses like GEICO insurance, candy companies, and even parts of big brands like Apple and Coca-Cola.

Buffett's smart investing has made the company very valuable. Its shares are the most expensive of any public company because they've never been split. Berkshire is one of the biggest employers in the U.S. and a top company on the stock market.
title: Berkshire Hathaway
